Migration.Name: Change fonts in Header Print Format
Migration.Comments: See: https://github.com/marcalwestf/adaxaFinReports/issues/19 . Se font of TEMPLATE Print Formats to San Serif bold 10.

Step.SQLStatement: update adempiere.ad_printformat set AD_PrintFont_ID=161 where ad_client_id=0 and name like '%** TEMPLATE **';
